casebody.data:
YOUNG (Lindquist)
v.
YOUNG. No. 213A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2005. Harold Lee Boughman, Jr., Fayetteville, for Steven Paul Young. *293Dale S. Morrison, Charlotte, for Nona Young. Nancy L. Grace, for Alvin & Sharon Young.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of May 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Steven Paul Young) shall have up to and including the 13th day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of May 2005."
